title: First timing champions in ranked play
body:
Do you guys think that it is ok for players to first time champions in ranked, considering it puts a team at a massive disadvantage usually. League is a 5 on 5 game and when you have a player that is not able to play his champion correctly and basically hands you a loss. I had an idea where you would at least get to the 3rd mastery level or even the second so you have a basic understanding of the champion you are playing.

Just looking for some thoughts on this.
